Packages
```{r setup}
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(plotly)
```

Data Import
```{r}
library(readr)
adae <- read_csv("https://rhoinc.github.io/data-library/data/clinical-trials/adam/adae.csv")

adae
```

Data Wrangling
```{r}
new_adae <- adae %>%
 filter(!(SITE %in% "Clinical Site 01")) %>%
 filter(!(ARM %in% "Screen Failure")) 

new_adae
```

Data Viz1
```{r}

dv1 <- ggplot(new_adae) +
 aes(x = AESEV, fill = SEX) +
 geom_bar() +
 scale_fill_hue(direction = 1) +
 theme_minimal()

ggplotly(dv1)

```

Dataviz2
```{r}


dv2 <- ggplot(new_adae) +
 aes(x = AESEV, weight = AGE) +
 geom_bar(fill = "#112446") +
 theme_minimal() +
 facet_wrap(vars(SEX))

ggplotly(dv2)

```

Dataviz3
```{r}


dv3 <- ggplot(new_adae) +
 aes(x = AESEV, fill = ARM) +
 geom_bar() +
 scale_fill_hue(direction = 1) +
 coord_flip() +
 theme_minimal()

ggplotly(dv3)
```
